uvi.description:
usb: host: ohci-tmio: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.162 by commit f98986b7acb4219f95789095eced93ed69d81d35. For more details please see the references link.
